item.title: The Ethereum Foundation has transferred 1000 ETH to an internal related address, worth $3.88 million.
item.description: On July 28th, as monitored by PeckShield, the Ethereum Foundation made an internal transfer of 1,000 ETH (approximately $3.88 million) to the associated address 0xbC9a...fbC3. The address currently holds 2,700 ETH, with a value of about $10.6 million.

item.title: Binance Alpha and Margin will list Naoris Protocol (NAORIS)
item.description: On July 28th, both Binance Alpha and Binance Futures will list the Naoris Protocol (NAORIS).

item.title: Tether just minted 1B $USDT on #Tron with $0 Gas fee. There are now 82.69B $USDT on #Tron, accounting for over 50% of the total supply.
item.description: Tether just minted 1B $USDT on #Tron with $0 Gas fee. There are now 82.69B $USDT on #Tron, accounting for over 50% of the total supply.

item.title: Trader Eugene: The current market is experiencing widespread FOMO sentiment, trading requires noise cancellation
item.description: On July 28th, trader Eugene Ng Ah Sio put up on his personal channel and said, "We are now in a market exuberance stage - Fear of Missing Out (FOMO) is widespread. Major Key Opinion Leaders (KOLs) are showing off their profit achievements, trying to get you to join their paid groups. Everything seems to be like easy money."At this moment, the best approach is to filter out the noise on social media and focus on your own pace and goals. Your true opponent is only yourself. Comparison will only take away all your joy.

item.title: SuperRare has been attacked, losing approximately $730,000 worth of RARE.
item.description: On July 28th, as monitored by PeckShieldAlert, the NFT marketplace SuperRare was attacked, resulting in the loss of approximately $730,000 worth of RARE tokens.

item.title: In July, CEX Stablecoin Outflow Surged to $5.7 Billion
item.description: On July 28th, according to Sentora, in July, the net outflows of stablecoins from exchanges witnessed a significant surge to the highest level in nearly two years, with a total of over $5.7 billion being withdrawn.

item.title: EU Official: Discussion on Tariff Exemption for Wine and Spirits in EU-US Trade Agreement is Still Ongoing
item.description: July 28: EU officials indicated that the discussions on tariff exemptions for wine and spirits are still in progress within the EU-US trade agreement. (Xinhua Finance)

item.title: Binance Launches RWUSD, Bringing Tokenized Representation of RWA Assets such as US Treasury Bonds
item.description: On July 28th, Binance Earn launched RWUSD - a principal-guaranteed yield product aimed at tracking the yield performance of real-world assets (RWA) like tokenized U.S. Treasury bonds. Currently, users are able to earn an annualized yield (APR) of up to 4.2% while holding RWUSD.Users can subscribe to RWUSD by using eligible stablecoins (such as USDT or USDC), provided that they meet the eligibility requirements in their region. After subscribing, users will obtain an equivalent amount of RWUSD in their spot account at a 1:1 ratio, and Binance does not charge any subscription fees.When redeeming, RWUSD can be redeemed for USDC at a 1:1 ratio, regardless of the stablecoin initially used for subscription. Users have the option to choose between "Fast Redemption" and "Standard Redemption", and corresponding fees will be applicable upon redemption.

item.title: Analyst: The Fed May Restart Rate Cuts in September
item.description: On July 28th. Analysts from Bank Pictet stated in a report that the Federal Reserve might resume its rate-cutting cycle during the September FOMC meeting. They pointed out that the weakening economic prospects suggest that the Fed will adopt looser monetary policy in the second half of the year. They further added that the uncertainty regarding inflation following the tariff increase, along with the political pressure from President Trump to cut rates, have prevented a rate cut this month.They declared that after July, the stagnant private consumption and the reduced investment plans (indicating softening demand) will demonstrate that despite inflation being above the target, it is justified to ease the restrictive policy stance. (FXStreet)

item.title: RWA Project Asteroid X's Official Twitter Account Hacked, Hacker Has Posted a Scam Link
item.description: On July 28th, the official Twitter account of Asteroid X, which has the goal of tokenizing high-quality mining exploration assets in Australia, was hacked. The hacker has posted a scam link.BlockBeats wants to remind users: Do not interact with this account. Please be careful and protect your assets.
